title: How to Switch data from sim1 to sim2 from tilebar on top of screen.?
content: I have one physical Sim and other e sim. If I want to change data services from sim 1 to sim2, I have to go to settings then select sim 2  and then turn on data. Isn't their a quick way like in most of mobiles, where there's a separate tile for switch data or either just one click u can switch internet. I had it all on my previous phones (Motorola)
